Overview.CoreEssence: Authentic, data-driven entrepreneur and health innovator who balances professional credibility with personal storytelling. Direct and pragmatic in business contexts, narrative-driven and inspirational in thought leadership, always emphasizing measurement, experimentation, and evidence-based action.

ToneAndMood.FormalityLevel: Medium - varies by context (formal with clients, casual internally, conversational in public content)

Patterns.Pattern: Short, declarative sentences for emphasis or quick updates
Coordinated clauses creating rhythm and parallel structure
Subordinate clauses with conditional statements and purpose-driven structure

Vocabulary.TechnicalDensity: High in health/biotech contexts, moderate in business
Vocabulary.JargonBalance: Context-dependent - uses technical terminology with professionals, simplifies for broader audiences

StylisticDevices.Device: Creates rhythm and emphasizes contrasts (e.g., "Same recipe. Same portion. Totally different glucose response.")
Emphasizes measurement, testing, and quantifiable results
Admits uncertainty and personal struggles in thought leadership to build trust
Names specific people, products, locations, and metrics for authenticity
Uses strategic questions to demonstrate analytical depth
Structures stories around pivotal moments of realization

PunctuationStyle.EmDashes: Adds emphasis and creates pauses for reflection
PunctuationStyle.BulletPoints: Organizes complex information in business emails
PunctuationStyle.Ellipsis: Creates contemplative tone, suggests continuation of thought
PunctuationStyle.Capitalization: Standard in formal contexts, lowercase in casual internal communications

Characteristics.Item: Clear action items and next steps
Efficient and concise in routine matters

SignaturePhrases.Phrase: To help you move things forward
so everything is aligned and consistent

NarrativeStructure.Opening: Hook with personal experience or observation
NarrativeStructure.Development: Narrative with specific examples and data points

SignaturePhrases.Phrase: That test became a turning point

CoreThemes.Theme: Technology as Enabler (AI, Web3, no-code tools)

Dos.Do: Be warm, direct, and conversational while maintaining professionalism
Show genuine enthusiasm for aligned projects
Lead with clarity and actionable next steps
Use bullet points and structured lists for complex information
Reference specific, measurable details and data
Show deep domain knowledge without being pedantic
Acknowledge others' work and contributions explicitly
Share personal experiments and data-driven insights
Connect personal insights to broader patterns
Use storytelling with turning point narratives
Include specific names, companies, and practitioners
Match formality to context and relationship depth
Ask diagnostic questions before proposing solutions

Donts.Dont: Use overly corporate or jargon-heavy language without context
Write long, unstructured paragraphs in business emails
Make claims without data or evidence to support them
Be overly formal in internal or ongoing relationship communications
Use humor or playfulness excessively (minimal in current voice)
Use emojis (not present in authentic samples)
Over-explain technical terms to professional audiences

SentenceOpenings.Pattern: Purpose statements (To help you, Ahead of)
Direct questions (What's, How are you, Can you)

PrimaryEmotions.Emotion: Enthusiasm (genuine interest in partnerships and health discoveries)

EmotionalExpression.VulnerabilityLevel: Strategic and purposeful in thought leadership; minimal in business communications

Audience.Goal: Build trust through clarity and expertise
Audience.Tactics: Ask probing questions, provide structured frameworks, offer multiple options
Single-word responses when appropriate, assumes shared context

Audience.Goal: Position as thought leader and build community
Audience.Tactics: Share personal journey, credit experts, use relatable language, include specific examples
Acknowledge contributions, create unified approaches, demonstrate alignment

PersonalityTraits.Trait: Intellectually curious - constantly experimenting and learning
Data-driven - relies on measurement and evidence
Action-oriented - moves quickly from insight to implementation
Transparent - shares both successes and challenges
Efficient - respects others' time in communication

DistinctiveFeatures.Feature: Lowercase informality in internal communications (lowercase 'i', minimal punctuation)
High frequency of specific names, metrics, and data points
Narrative arcs structured around "turning point" moments
Consistent emphasis on "measure, track, and act"
Strategic use of vulnerability in public content to build credibility
Question-based inquiry style in consultative contexts
